about_the_game:
Whispers in the Woods is an atmospheric first-person horror experience that takes players deep into a cursed forest, where they must unravel dark secrets while being stalked by an ancient evil. In this linear horror adventure, players step into the role of a lost wanderer who stumbles upon an abandoned campsite and an eerie log cabin, both filled with cryptic notes left by previous victims.

With an immersive environment full of dense fog, shadowy figures lurking just out of sight, and unsettling whispers that grow louder with each step, Whispers in the Woods creates an atmosphere of dread that lingers long after you’ve turned off the game. Players must carefully explore the forest and the cabin’s basement, piecing together the story while solving small environmental puzzles. Clues hidden along the path hint at the nature of the curse and suggest a slim hope for breaking it—but doing so means venturing straight into the heart of danger.

This game is designed for fans of slow-burn horror, blending tense exploration with chilling lore. The shadows that stalk you aren’t just figments of imagination—they’re real, and they’re watching. With each clue you uncover, you’ll feel the forest tightening its grip, building a sense of claustrophobic dread as you realize there may be no escape.

Ellie wakes up lost in a dense, fog-covered forest with no memory of how they got there. She must navigate through the forest to find a way out, all while being pursued by an unseen force that stalks her in the shadows. The deeper she go, the more unsettling the environment becomes, and the player uncovers disturbing clues about the forest’s cursed history.

Key Features:

  • Atmospheric Exploration: Traverse a dense, fog-laden forest and uncover abandoned camps, ominous groves, and the unsettling confines of a decaying cabin.

  • Creeping Terror: Experience the dread of being hunted by shadowy figures that lurk in the trees and fog, always just out of reach, but never out of mind.

  • Story-Driven Horror: Follow a linear narrative filled with scattered notes and environmental storytelling, piecing together the tragic past of those who came before.

  • Puzzles and Clues: Solve simple puzzles and search for hidden clues to unlock the mystery of the Whispering Tree and the curse that holds the forest in its grip.

Whispers in the Woods is a journey into a haunted wilderness where the past and present collide, and where survival depends on facing down an ancient evil—or becoming its next victim. Perfect for horror enthusiasts looking for a deeply immersive experience, this game will leave you questioning every shadow and every whisper. Are you brave enough to confront the darkness?
